overview: Okay, so we’ve more than a sneaking suspicion that you’re not gonna believe the title when it says that the boys in this totally raw escapade are as sweet and innocent as they appear on the cover, but don’t let that put you off from enjoying this wanton adventure featuring the likes of Andy Kay, Terry Ryan and Austin Lock. Indeed, we know for a fact that you’re gonna love every one of the gorgeous beauties featured here, as they suck and fuck like the no-holds-barred sluts that they’ve clearly all been for quite a while. No question about it, these are all prime-time gay whores of the highest value; as they savour and enjoy every last hard inch of manly flesh on offer, before relishing the splatter of cum in all directions!
title: Sweet Innocent & Totally Raw
